title: Introducing: Cristin Young
content:
I’ve spent a decent part of this evening trying to get my head around Cristin Young.

Hailing from China, her instagram paints the picture of someone who spends a great deal of time travelling, rarely settling in one place, and her only other social media (aside from the below Bandcamp page) is a VK page (understandable given her whereabouts) and a Tumblr. Her music is quite distant, otherworldly in parts, yet startlingly beautiful. Take the transcendent We Are Birds, or the more upbeat, EP opener Asia, there’s a colossal variety in her sound, and one that’s purposefully hard to pin down. For now, Cristin Young appears as somewhat of an enigma, a majestic one at that. Stream We Are Birds below, and the EP in full underneath that.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
